TIMELINE

This timeline shows how DIAS and surrounding discourses developed over time. Presenting a chronological sequence, multiple overlapping temporalities can be explored through two layers. The horizontal timeline shows an overview of key moments related to DIAS, the vertical time line presents more detailed sub-events.

  • 2014

    Initial investigation

  • 2016

    Public disclosure

  • 2019

    Legal proceedings

2000

Early system pilots / procurement groundwork (placeholder)

2017

DIAS introduced into to asylum procedure.

2021

Policy/legal debates and expert evidence framing (placeholder)

2025

Thesis investigation updates; mapping actors & documents (placeholder)

2016

Institutional rollout discussions (placeholder)

2019

Critique intensifies (opacity, bias, evidentiary role) (placeholder)

2023

Ongoing reporting + civil society attention (placeholder)

Archival platform for my Master's thesis. Built with Eleventy & vanilla JS.
